articles.author: Seb Starcevic, Zoya Sheftalovich
articles.title: EU to Trump: We’re proud of our leaders, actually - politico.eu
articles.description: The U.S. president thinks Europe is run by weaklings, but millions of Europeans beg to differ, top official says.
articles.content:
Asked by POLITICO to respond to Trumps withering assessment, the European Commission’s Chief Spokesperson Paula Pinho mounted a spirited defense of Europes leaders.  
“We are very pleased and gratef… [+967 chars]
